text: Write the code as if it will be accompanied by a violent psychopath who knows where you live
author: Steve McConnell

text: The complexity of the program grows until it exceeds the abilities of the programmer
author: Arthur Bloch

text: Walking on water and developing programs following the TOR is very easy... if they are frozen
author: I. Berard

text: Soon there will be only two groups of workers: those who control computers, and those who are controlled by computers. Try to get into the first
author: Lewis D. Eigen

text: The computer revolution is changing everything so rapidly. that only fourteen-year-olds really understand what's going on
author: Dave Barry

text: Only a computer that is turned off is reliably protected
author: Eugene Kaspersky

text: The newest computer is a computer that either became obsolete yesterday or will appear tomorrow
author: Sydney Brenner

text: The danger is not that a computer will one day start thinking like a human, but that a human will one day start thinking like a computer
author: Sidney J. Harris

text: The computer executes your commands, but is not able to read your thoughts
author: Donald Nat

text: Computers make our lives easier, they do a lot of things, but these things for the most part should not be done at all
author: Andy Rooney

text: If you wrote something down in computer memory, remember where you wrote it down
author: Leo Beiser
